data.title: Freelance Backend Developer
data.description: As a backend developer, I create APIs, design database systems, and integrate third-party APIs like Challonge for tournament bracket generator. At MovesGG, a platform for gaming tournaments, I focus on building scalable backend services to handle tournament management and ensure smooth integration with external services.
